name: Winter Evacuee
description: You have survived the initial wave of panic, and have achieved (relative) safety in one of the many government evac shelters and its winter!.

name: Preped & cold
description: You knew something was coming, you prepared, when the dead rose, you boarded up your house. With your house now barricaded, it's time to make a decision.

name: Challenge - An Extra Really Bad Day
description: You start drunk to the point of incapacitation, depressed, infected, surrounded by fire, and sick with the flu in the beginning of winter.  This day went downhill really fast.
